<span style="background-color:#eee">Models used with fixed T</span>
---------------------

In previous Mimar analysis, we mainly have problems with the upper limit of T distribution. We decided to fix it to values according to [Evans et al. (2004)](http://www.columbia.edu/cu/biology/faculty/kelley/pdfs/Evans_etal_%202004_MPE.pdf) (T(*X.laevis*/*X.gilli*)=16700000 & T(*X.gilli*/*X.gilli*)=8500000). The mutation rate was also re-estimated from these values. 
Fixing T parameter induces to not drawing T plots (need to change Rconv script before executing it).
We run the jobs on kraken (when it is not specified) & on iqaluk to run for a longer time bigger jobs (specified in the comments) of sharcnet. 

**Complements**
- Big values of -i are used to see if it has a high impact on value 5=number of steps rejected with the Hasting ratio h < 1 (and so value 4=acceptance rate) of exsoutput
- High values of steps and burnin are used to try to keep only "good" steps (low convergence and very bad value 4 at the begining) - only 1000-10000 recorded steps are needed for the analysis - to regularly check the analysis we keep -L=90 (output generated every 90 min)

### 1- For all the populations included (*i.e.* east and west populations are included) of *Xenopus gilli* and *Xenopus laevis* (in the model we consider *X.gilli* as population 1 and *X. laevis* as population 2) - all_XLXG


### a. Symmetric MIGRATION

* <u><font size=4>Equal populations (thetaA = theta1 (X.gilli) = theta2 (X.laevis))</font></u>

```
#mimar_M_A_FT #11583309_SEED_Run1 37063 40293 55160
sqsub -r 7d -o outputmimar ./mimar 4000 10000 14 -lf allXLXG.in -u 2.47E-09 -t u 0.000005 0.03 -ej 11200000 -M l -8 3 -i 1000 -x 10 -y t -L 90 -v 0.0009 0.0004 800000 0.01 .4 0 -r e 1.667 -o exsoutput 

#mimar_M_A_FT #11583903_SEED_Run2_36703 34092 16505

#mimar_M_B_FT #11584337_SEED_Run1 37063 40293 55160
sqsub -r 7d -o outputmimar ./mimar 4000 10000 14 -lf allXLXG.in -u 2.47E-09 -t u 0.000005 0.03 -ej 16700000 -M l -8 3 -i 1000 -x 10 -y t -L 90 -v 0.0009 0.0004 800000 0.01 .4 0 -r e 1.667 -o exsoutput

#mimar_M_B_FT #11584338_SEED_Run2_36703 34092 16505
```
> **Results** - M-B-FT: Good mixing for 2 runs & convergence plots (Rplot+chartplot) ok
